dimensions: 86.2 x 85.7 cm (33 15/16 x 33 3/4 in. ), irregular sheet
title: The Atheneum, New Harmony, Indiana
medium: Color lithograph on heavy white wove paper
description: Building plan on its site, at center, with suggestions of sky, grass, shadows and landscape, printed in grays and beiges; elevations of north, east, south, and west facades are at top, right, bottom and left respectively.
name: print
